name: Observe.AI
headline: Contact center AI platform.
description:
Observe.AI, a leader in Contact Center AI, transforms customer experiences and improves agent performance by helping top brands analyze 100% of calls and streamline quality assurance workflows. With Observe.AI, businesses transcribe every call with high accuracy and coach agents while gaining full visibility into their customer service operations. Observe.AI brings the power of agent assistance, automatic speech recognition, and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to modern contact centers and their frontline teams.
Observe.AI is trusted by more than 150 customers and partners, including Root Insurance, Alcon Laboratories, Tripadvisor, and Pearson. Backed by Menlo Ventures, Next47, NGP Capital, Scale Ventures, Nexus Ventures, Emergent Ventures, Steadview Capital, 01 Ventures and Y-Combinator, Observe.AI’s headquarters is in San Francisco with an office in Bangalore, India. For more information, visit www.observe.ai.

# The AI platform for contact centers
## Turn every customer conversation into automated action
## Your partner to a 60% autonomous contact center
Observe.AI combines conversation intelligence with AI-powered automation to help you evaluate 100% of your customer interactions, support agents and sellers in real time and post-interaction, and boost customer satisfaction—all while reducing operating costs.
Automate routine customer calls, augment agents with real-time assistance, and AutoQA 100% of interactions, all on the Observe.AI conversation intelligence platform.
[Schedule a demo](https://observe.ai/</demo>)[Watch product tour](https://observe.ai/</on-demand-demo>)

Our AI-powered conversation intelligence platform and products are here to support your high-performing teams.

Automate your high-volume, complex customer calls with agentic AI that understands caller intent and resolves inquiries with human-like eloquence.

### Real-time AI
Replicate winning actions for your customer-facing teams with real-time agent assist, smart scripts, prompts, and after-call summaries.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5caac3a8d636b7cfc2606d35/6701b1795ebcffcb90961584_inline-icon.svg)](https://observe.ai/</real-time-ai>)

generated_description:
**Observe.AI: Revolutionizing Contact Centers with AI**

Founded in 2017 and hailing from the Y Combinator W18 batch, Observe.AI has carved a niche in the competitive space of contact center solutions. With its headquarters in San Francisco and another office in Bangalore, the company is at the forefront of leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance customer experiences and improve agent performance.

### Mission and Offerings

At its core, Observe.AI aims to transform contact centers into highly efficient, AI-driven operations. By analyzing 100% of calls, it delivers invaluable insights that streamline quality assurance and enhance the ongoing training of agents. Their platform employs automatic speech recognition and natural language processing (NLP) technologies, making it possible for companies to transcribe calls with remarkable accuracy. This is not just about automation; it's about intelligently augmenting human capabilities.

The platform features several key functionalities:
- **VoiceAI Agents**: Automate high-volume calls while maintaining a personable approach.
- **Real-Time AI**: Provides agents with live assistance to enhance customer interactions.
- **Post-Interaction AI**: Ensures every call is subject to quality assurance, targeted coaching, and performance analytics to refine operations.
- **Business Analytics**: Access to critical insights that drive operational efficiencies and revenue growth.

### Client Trust and Partnerships

A testament to its effectiveness, Observe.AI has garnered the trust of over 150 customers, including impressive names like Root Insurance, Alcon Laboratories, Tripadvisor, and Pearson. The company has attracted significant financial backing from notable venture firms such as Menlo Ventures, Nexus Ventures, and Y-Combinator, positioning it for continued growth and innovation.

### Proven Impact

The metrics speak volumes about the impact Observe.AI has had on its client base:
- A 23% reduction in average handling time (AHT).
- A 20% uplift in sales conversions.
- A notable 97% improvement in compliance monitoring.
- The platform's success extends to measurable operational efficiencies and elevated customer satisfaction levels.

### Team and Culture

With a dedicated team of around 240 professionals, Observe.AI champions a culture of innovation and continuous improvement. They understand that to stay ahead, one must adapt quickly, learn from data, and deliver real-world solutions that matter to businesses.

### A Future-Ready Contact Center 

In a world where customer expectations are continuously evolving, Observe.AI stands out by not only addressing these challenges head-on but also turning them into opportunities. By integrating sophisticated AI tools within contact centers, they provide businesses with the chance to enhance agent performance, boost customer satisfaction, and ultimately drive growth.

If you’re looking to elevate your contact center operations, observe their offerings or request a demo at [www.observe.ai](https://www.observe.ai).
